description: METS-R ADDSEVS simulator is a high fidelity, parallel, agent-based evacuation simulator for multi-modal energy-optimal trip scheduling in real-time (METS-R) at transportation hubs. It consists of two modules. The first one is the traffic simulator module; the second one is the high-performance computing (HPC) module. More details can be found at https://umnilab.github.io/METS-R_doc/.
name: An agent-based deployment decision-support system for electric vehicle services
organization: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
tags: Office of Scientific and Technical Information (OSTI)
